issue.title: [C++] ensure C++ implementation meets clarified dictionary spec
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
see parent issue.

 

CC `[~tianchen92]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7285?focusedCommentId=17064918) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This won't be completed in 0.17.0

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7285?focusedCommentId=17083899) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
[~emkornfield@gmail.com] If nobody else is working on this issue, may I try to provide a patch for it?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7285?focusedCommentId=17085425) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
I'm not at the moment.  @wesm anybody on your side?
